title: Zoola Antigua
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Hostel and restaurant. Young and relaxing atmosphere. Varied menu with some veg dishes that based on chickpeas, beans, sesame and vegetables like falafel, hummus, frijol, tahini, salads, sandwich, pasta, and smoothies. Dairy is used, so vegans to specify.
